content: space chain 3 6x end with 3 edc r4 chain 3 2 edc 1 shell st into v-st chain space 6x end with 3 edc r5 r14 repeat r3 and r4 for more 10 row approx 12 = pattern without chain loops x 13 75 width note you can make it longer or shorter pattern 4 e g a p respect the authors/designers right this pattern is property of adriana r baiocco you cannot modify resell use my videos my pictures or
